attributes.action: Abolish plans to increase council tax for clean working families who look after there properties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petition against Gordon Browns preposal to increase council tax if you work and look after your house. This means you will be taxed because you maintain your properties, do your gardening, put your rubbish out for collection. Basically if you dont spend you money on drugs and alcohol and spend it upgrading your property, you will be penalised.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
